data.expected_result: There should be a Next button
data.short_description: [Firefox ONLY] The "Next" button when confirming your Credit Card information is missing
data.steps_to_repro: - You must NOT have Nitro to test this (or be on an account that doesn't have it) -   - Go to User Settings - Click "Discord Nitro" - Click "$4.99 / Month" (or the equivalent in your region/locale) - Enter in fake details - Observe how there's no Next button in the space where it should be
